text:
Eiza Gonzalez and Eugenio Derbez are having a fantastic year!

MORE:Guillermo Del Toro Leads the Pack with 13 Oscar Nods, But Latinos Are Still Underrepresented in Hollywood

Eiza starred in the hit blockbuster film Baby Driver while Eugenio is starring in the remake of the classic film Overboard due later this year. The two have recieved much love from American audiences and now they have been bestowed the honor of becoming Oscar Presenters!

The two did what many of us do when we want to show off our latest accomplishments, post on Instagram. Eiza told her 3.3 million followers that, "A small girl from Mexico dreamt her whole life of this moment, never expecting it to become true. I cried. Always fight for your dreams and believe in yourself even when everything looks hopeless."

Eugenio charmed his 4.7 million followers on instagram when he posted this:

PLUS:These Kids Recreate 'The Shape of Water' and Other Oscar Nominated Characters and It's Hilarious!

These two are joined by fellow Latin Americans presenting at the Oscars including Oscar Isaac, Daniela Vega, Gina Rodriguez, Lin-Manuel Miranda, and the iconic Rita Moreno. We're expecting this years 90th Academy Awards ceremony to be fierce.
title: Mexican Stars, Eiza Gonzalez and Eugenio Derbez, Celebrate Being Named Oscar Presenters in the Cutest Way!
